processingCommand.script:
if "${CheckLoadItemCode}"=="" GOTO SKIPSTEP
Echo on
${XT_FILELOADMONITOR} -d CONFIG -f ${CheckLoadItemCode}
Echo off
set retcode=%errorlevel%
echo FileLoadMonitor ended with return code: %retcode%
IF %retcode% EQU 0 GOTO NORMALFLOW
GOTO ERRORFLOW
:NORMALFLOW
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:ERRORFLOW
set resexe=1
GOTO END
:SKIPSTEP
Echo CheckLoadItemCode variable not set, step is skipped
set resexe=0
GOTO END
:END
exit %resexe%
